sentence.Network_en: Why did you do that, you cretin?
sentence.Network_cn: 你为什么这样做，你这个傻瓜？

sentence.Network_en: Why else would I have chosen such a disreputable looking cretin?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么我选中的其他人象个白痴?

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French crétin, from Swiss French crestin 'Christian' (from Latin Christianus), here used to mean 'human being', apparently as a reminder that, though deformed, cretins were human and not beasts

entry.def: If you call someone a cretin, you think they are very stupid.

auth_sentence.content: "Let me go back," he said slowly, enunciating each syllable so as to be sure of being understood by this cretin.
